name: BLUES
description:
BLUES is a 3D top down, pac-man style game where you try and finds the exit to the next level while hopefully avoiding the enemies trying to stop you.

 This game took a totally of 2 & a half weeks to create. Please let me know what you think of the game, all feedback is welcome. Check out my YouTube channel as I love creating devlogs for my current games.

My game was created using the following programs

  1. Unity
  2. PlayMaker
  3. DoozyUI
